title: Refund for Border/Icon? Not what I thought it was.
body:
Greetings League of Legends Staff!

I recently created a new account and put some RP points on it and I bought about 240 tokens and eventually got the Border and Icon for Nightbringer Yasuo, and I didn't realize that the border ONLY worked on Nightbringer Yasuo, I thought it was just a border available to you if you had that and it would be seen on every champion, not just Yasuo with that specific skin.

So, I want to kindly ask the League of Legends Staff if I could get a refund on it, I have 3 available refunds on my account and I would like to use one of them to refund this to make it fairer than just asking for a simple refund.

Unless I'm mistaken and it's just bugging out, and I can't see the border (I'm still not 100% sure about it), I would like a refund.

Kindly, 
One of your loyal players.

replies.body:
I want to say there's a pretty good chance that we could make that happen, especially since you do still have your refund tokens. I'm not part of the team that would make that call though, so I'd suggest reaching out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). 

Try to get that ticket in as soon as you can, as they're much more likely to help out if they get the ticket shortly after the purchase.
